    • Method Detail

      • showForm

        @GetMapping("/show_form")
public java.lang.String showForm​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Displays the user registration form.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to be populated with data for the view
        Returns:
        the view name to display ("users/register_form")

      • registerUser

        @PostMapping("/register")
public java.lang.String registerUser​(@ModelAttribute("user_data")
                                     UserData userData,
                                     org.springframework.ui.Model theModel)
        Registers a new user based on the submitted form data.
        Parameters:
        userData - the user data submitted from the registration form
        theModel - the model to be populated with data for the view
        Returns:
        the view name to redirect to ("redirect:/index.html") upon successful registration, or the view name to display ("users/register_form") with an error message if registration fails
